title: Reccomendation Cold Email
original_prompt:
I want you to act as a Computer Science PhD applicant.  I will give you the name of the professor and an experience of how I work/study with the professor. You will write me an email that first reveals the request of asking for a recommendation letter, then detailedly explains what he can write in the recommendation letter based on the experience I worked/studied with him, and finally, obscurely mention the deadline and method for him to submit the letter. The email should be both sincere and engaging.
My name is Jay LaLa. The professor's name is John Denero. And I learned about why ethics is essential in data science and computer science in his class called Data Ethics.

input1_ans:
Subject: Request for a Recommendation Letter

Dear Professor Denero,

I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to ask if you would be willing to write a recommendation letter for my PhD application in Computer Science. I have greatly valued the time I spent in your Data Ethics class and the subsequent research project we worked on together regarding the implications of algorithmic bias in machine learning.

Your guidance during that project was pivotal in deepening my understanding of the ethical considerations in technology. I appreciated how you emphasized the importance of recognizing and addressing the impact of algorithmic decisions on marginalized communities. This experience not only enhanced my technical skills but also instilled in me a strong sense of responsibility as a future computer scientist. I believe your insights into my work ethic, analytical abilities, and commitment to ethical practices in technology would provide a compelling perspective in your letter.

If you could highlight my ability to engage critically with complex ethical issues and my dedication to advocating for equitable technology, I would be incredibly grateful. Your perspective as a mentor who has witnessed my growth firsthand would add significant weight to my application.

The deadline for submission is approaching, and I would be happy to provide any additional information you might need to make the process easier. The recommendation can be submitted online through the application portal, and I can send you the necessary details if you agree to assist me.

Thank you very much for considering my request. I truly appreciate your support and guidance throughout my academic journey.

Warm regards,

Jay LaLa
